attributes.action: The breeding of puppies and kittens for profit by unlicensed breeders be banned.
attributes.additional_details: Go online do a search for pups or kittens and look at the prices people are asking. No wonder people see it as an easy way to make money.
attributes.background: A pet is a member of your family and not an object that could potentially earn you thousands of pounds. It makes me angry to see adverts for pups and kittens by unlicensed breeders using animals like breeding machines. UK Farmers have to comply with regulations for livestock so should these 'people'
